archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.abstract: A galley proof of Francis Gwaltney's book A Step in the River.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Francis Gwaltney galley proof, Accession #11046, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This item was transfered to Special Collections from Rare Books, University of Virginia Library, on August 27, 1992.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Arkansas writer Francis Gwaltney (b. 1921) taught English at Arkansas Tech University and has written several novels.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of a 1960 galley proof of A Step in the Riverby Francis Irby Gwaltney, uncorrected, bound with blue paper covers, and of ca. 200 galley pages.
